name: One More Try (nyanpierre, RavenSkin01, Marine Gambier, Nausicaa, Iskyse, Decadencia)
name_original: One More Try (nyanpierre, RavenSkin01, Marine Gambier, Nausicaa, Iskyse, Decadencia)
description:
WELCOME TO THE ONE MORE TRY CHALLENGE !

SO ONE MORE TRY IS A BOSS BATTLE BOSS RUSH PRODUCED IN A MONTH FOR THE BOSS RUSH JAM.

THIS JAM WAS ABOUT MAKESHIFT. THE PLAYER WILL HAVE TO RECOVER ELEMENTS OF THE GAME DURING THE FIGHT TO USE THEM AS A WEAPON !

OUR GAME IS PLAYABLE WITH A CONTROLLER OR WITH AND KEYBOARD .

↓ HERE IS A LITTLE SCHEME THAT WILL HELP YOU TO PLAY THE GAME ↓

/!\Keyboard is advised, Controller is bugged and make the game impossible/!\

ENJOY AND HAVE FUN !
